app.title: Chat to Notion
app.subtitle: Send your chat conversations to Notion with ease

form.apiKeyHelp: Copy the secret code from your {{link}} ("Show" or "Refresh" button)
form.databaseIdHelp: The database must have "Name" (title) and "Date" (date) properties

properties.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Additional Properties
properties.description: Select the properties you want to use when sending chats to Notion
properties.none: No additional properties available in your database.

instructions.title: üìñ Configuration Instructions
instructions.step2: Copy the "Internal Integration Secret" (click "Show" to see it)
instructions.step3: Create or open a database in Notion
instructions.step4: Make sure your database has "Name" (title) and "Date" (date) properties
instructions.step5: Share the database with your integration (click "..." ‚Üí "Add connections")
instructions.step6: Copy the database ID from the URL: notion.so/[workspace]/[database_id]?v=...
instructions.step6Note: The ID is the part between the last "/" and the "?" in the URL

chat.title: Send a chat to Notion
chat.notConfigured: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please configure your Notion credentials in the Configuration tab first
chat.missingProperties: ‚ö†Ô∏è The following properties do not exist in your Notion database:
chat.missingPropertiesNote: Please create these properties in Notion or remove these fields before sending.

form.contentPlaceholder:
Paste your chat conversation here...

Example:
User: What is React?
Assistant: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces...

tips.title: üí° Tips
tips.tip1: You can paste complete conversations from ChatGPT or other platforms
tips.tip2: The first line will be used as the title in Notion
tips.tip3: Select a date to organize your chats chronologically
tips.tip4: The chat will be saved as a new page in your configured Notion database

errors.notConfigured: Please configure Notion credentials in the Configuration tab first
errors.apiKeyRequired: Secret code and database ID are required
errors.noTitleProperty: No 'title' type property found in the database. Please create a title type property.
errors.notionNotConfigured: Notion is not configured. Please configure credentials first.

success.chatSent: Chat sent to Notion successfully ({{blocks}} blocks created)
success.chatSentWithDate: Chat sent to Notion successfully ({{blocks}} blocks created) - Date: {{date}}
success.chatSentNoDate: Chat sent to Notion successfully ({{blocks}} blocks created) - ‚ö†Ô∏è No date property found in your database
